Key Match Events: Anthony Volpe hit a go-ahead grand slam in the third inning.
The Yankees won their first game in this postseason by more than three runs.
Aaron Judge hit an RBI single in the eighth inning.
Austin Wells went 2-for-3 and hit a home run.
Post-Match Reflections: The Yankees' victory cut their series deficit to 3-1.
The Dodgers' strategy involved using their high-leverage relievers only if they held a lead.
Dodgers manager Dave Roberts made a similar gamble in the National League Championship Series.
The Yankees' ace, Gerrit Cole, will start Game 5.
